main event: An object was observed directly overhead moving from west to east in Reno, Nevada, appearing very bright and obscuring the stars.
interesting points: The object was described as looking like a star with a tail., The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object faded out at about 30 degrees., The observer initially thought it was a satellite until it stopped., The report notes that local ranches had no other known observers of the object.
sighted object: one bright object in the sky
